emenma, samagi jana balawegaya wisin da hitapu kathanayaka karu jayasuriyata jathika layisthu manthri dhurayak bhara ganna lesata danum di athi bawata wartha pala wanawa.kese wethath, samagi jana balawegaya saha eksath jathika pakshaya thawamath jathika layisthu manthri dhura sambandhayen awasan thinduwakata elambaa naha.emenma, jathika jana balawegaya yatathe parlimenthuwata pathwana jathika layisthu manthriwaraya kawurun da yanna pilibadawa ada (11) dinaya thula prakashayata path karana bawayi ema pakshaye lekam lakshman nipunaaarachchi prakasha kale.
nam, gam manahkalpitha karamin ohu kiyana kathawa pamanak dan api obata kiyannemu.
